General.Name: Star Health and Allied Insurance Company Limited
General.Description: Star Health and Allied Insurance Company Limited provides health insurance products in India. The company offers retail health products to various customer segments, including individuals, families, students, and senior citizens, as well as persons with pre-existing medical conditions across the middle-market customer segment; and group health insurance policies provide to employees of corporates, including small to medium enterprises through company health insurance plans. It also provides personal accident and travel insurance products. The company distributes its products through individual agents, brokers, corporate agent banks, corporate agents, insurance marketing firms, and online channel partners comprising web aggregators. It operates various health insurance branches. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Chennai, India.
General.Address: No.1, New Tank Street, Chennai, India, 600034
